# Inertia.js Rails

> Build single-page apps, without building an API.

Create modern single-page React, Vue, and Svelte apps using classic server-side routing.

## Table of Contents

- [Introduction](/guide.md)
- [Demo application](/guide/demo-application.md)
- [Upgrade guide for v2.0](/guide/upgrade-guide.md)

### Installation

- [Server-side setup](/guide/server-side-setup.md)
- [Client-side setup](/guide/client-side-setup.md)

- [Who is Inertia.js for?](/guide/who-is-it-for.md)
- [How it works](/guide/how-it-works.md)
- [The protocol](/guide/the-protocol.md)
